title: Liberal ideas in India and European influence

content.prompt: The spread of the liberal ideas discussed in the passage was most directly a result of which of the following?

choices.label: The influence of European political and educational institutions facilitated by British imperial policies in India
The revival of traditional Hindu social structures as a reaction against British influence in India
The example of American revolutions influenced by Enlightenment principles
The return of overseas migrants from plantations in the Pacific and Caribbean

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
